SELECT cover,title,actor,id,c_date FROM movie
type like '%${type}%'
AND ratring >= #{rating}
AND unix_timestamp(c_date) >= unix_timestamp(#{time}) AND unix_timestamp(c_date) <= unix_timestamp(#{time})
AND actor like '%${actor}%'
AND director like '%${director}%'
AND MATCH(title_fc) AGAINST (#{key})
ORDER BY c_date ASC
ORDER BY c_date DESC
LIMIT #{from},#{pageSize}
